name: Antitower
storyline:
Your rival barged into your home and tampered your elemental grimoire. 
 
Monsters have been summoned and the elemental balance has been broken. 
 
The elemental laws are rewritten after every fight. Can you adapt to them?
summary:
Chaotic, voice-controlled memory game. 
 
Your rival barged into your home and tampered your elemental grimoire. 
 
Monsters have been summoned and the elemental balance has been broken. 
 
The elemental laws are rewritten after every fight. Can you adapt to them?
